song.title: Get Right
song.lyrics:
I want for to lay down, I'm waiting 'till sundown I'm searching the haystacks, water is sunshine, Wait for the moment The moment between us, the fire is made now, Harder to touch
I wanted to get right I wanted to get right I wanted to get right with you
Bakers dozen parades, Stand and debate Out single file, nine in a row, swear if you must Keeping your boots on, float with the now, Hot to the touch Concrete underground, cast out everyday, The dregs of society Underbelly, beside me, rejoice and follow thee
I wanted to get right I wanted to get right I wanted to get right With it, with you
